I do not own a camera, so I try to post and boost the best bird photos taken by others. I'll always credit where known, but if I don't know the photographer and you do, please tell me and I'll edit to credit.

Avatar is a floofy, borby, frowny birb. Header is a line of autumn leaves ranging (L to R) from green to brilliant red.
